settings.title: Shipping and Fulfilment
settings.description: See What Mileseey Is Always Chasing For

settings.title: Order tracking
settings.desc:
Thank you for ordering our product, for economic and light package, please kindly track the shipment status with the below optional links and the shipping tracking number.

1.http://track.4px.com/#/

2.https://www.17track.net/en (choose carrier as 4PX)

settings.title: Shipping solutions
settings.desc: We understand customer's concern and build up the complete fulfillment system. We are ready to fulfill each order with the safe, quick, traceable and economic airline package solution.

settings.title: Global economic package by airline
settings.desc:
The logistics provider 4PX has established the global delivery network in more than 170 countries with the local official post system.

http://track.4px.com/#/

We provide the free shipping solution for the light package to save shipping cost for customers.

Normally customers can receive the package in 7-12 days and depend on the custom clearance process of the destination country.

settings.title: Fulfillment by local warehouse
settings.desc:
We also have ready stock for the major items in local warehouses in US, UK, Germany and Australia etc with fast delivery solution including FBA service etc.
Normally customers can receive the package within 3-5 days according to local delivery schedule.

settings.title: Golbal shipping by express
settings.desc: For the high value product, we can choose to delivery by DHL and offer the special discount support for the shipping cost.
